title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 474.1 - Use of permits, plates and stickers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 474.1 - Use of permits, plates and stickers

State Regulations

The permit and plate or sticker issued by the State Tax

Commission are for the motor vehicle specified therein. The permit may only be
used for the particular motor vehicle for which it was issued and the plate or
sticker may only be affixed to such motor vehicle. The permit and plate or
sticker may not be used on any other vehicle by the carrier to whom it was
issued, or by any other person. The issuance of a permit and plate or sticker
carries with it the responsibility for reporting on the operation of that
vehicle during each reporting period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
474.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
